name: PHP File Browser

screenshots.caption: Main Screen ( Optional Can Be Removed )
A Login If You Installed One, the download does not include one, just includes a button and Lightbox for your customizations
Actual File Explorer ( This Shot Has Old and Fixed Errors, Just Ignore them )

short_description: Our New PHP file browsers is a easy click and drag install, all you have to do is change the directory for your files for your hosting path. Easy to edit code, can be customized, works on both Linux and Windows PHP distributions, and is also compatible with home made XAMPP servers. The project was originally from another coder but was revamped and updated to todays PHP 5.2.X Standards. Works with PHP versions 5 till 5.2.X, we are working on bug fixing for versions above PHP 5.3.x.
summary: A NEW Simple, Lightweight PHP file manager for the web
